name: Sugar Mommy
description:
Sugar Mommy is an interactive cartoon where every choice you make matters! You are a young student who is about to be expelled from a university. The only possibility to stay in this university is to fuck the sexy rector of this university Savannah.

The senior student has been given a difficult task. He is being expelled from a prestigious university. He doesn't know what to do at all. His only thought is that he can fuck the rector and he will not be expelled. One day he walks into her office and that's when the whole story begins. You have to choose the right answers to end up in the same bed with the rector.

Features:
Interactive story: Every choice you make affects whether you will be expelled or not.
Interesting Characters: Meet Savannah, the rector, and Gabriel, a student.
Romance: Sparks fly in the air, but will it be love or just temporary passion?
